comment._content:
Hi, first of all I really want to thank all the Institutions wich join into this project, for me it has turned out more than wonderful. 
I studied History of Art, and I live and work in México, so having the opportunity of watching these images increase a lot my possibilities of knowledge, and so complete my mental library and fill gaps of what I know but I haden't had  the chance to see
